name: Bakuen no senshi Card Warrior Card

pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Card Warrior Kamen Riders (2009, manga/toyline)$(br)$(li)Used to access Ryuga's $(l:ryuki/riders/ryuga#bakuen_no_senshi)Bakuen no Senshi$(/l) form$(li)Used to access Faiz's $(l:faiz/riders/faiz#bakuen_no_senshi)Blaster Form (Bakuen no Senshi)$(/l)$(li)Used to access $(l:hibiki/riders/hibiki#bakuen_no_senshi)Hibiki Kurenai (Bakuen no Senshi)$(/l)
